popover.primary: A Mastery path focused on both you and your pet equally.
popover.secondary: Points in Path of the Axeman grants Strength and Weapon Skill to your lion.

popover.primary: A Mastery path focused on your pet distracting enemies while you deal damage.
popover.secondary: Points in Path of the Axeman grants Toughness and Initiative to your lion.

popover.primary: A Mastery path focused on assisting and supporting your pet while he deals damage.
popover.secondary: Points in the Guardian Tree grants Wounds, Toughness, Weapon Skill, Strength and Initiative to your lion.

data.name: Bypass Defenses
data.description: You bolster yourself for 10 seconds, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.

data.name: Siege Wrecker
data.description: You sabotage a siege ram, causing the ram to deal 98% of the original damage for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Faultfinder
data.description: Increases friendly ram damage by 2% for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Axe Toss
data.description: You fling a throwing axe at your target, dealing 81 damage.

data.name: Call War Lion
data.description:
You call your tamed War Lion to come forth and fight with you.
You may only have a single War Lion at a time.

data.name: Flee
data.description: You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds.  You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

data.name: Charge!
data.description: You and your War Lion charge into the thick of battle, increasing your movement speed by 50 for 7 seconds.  If you or your War Lion use any abilities, this effect will immediately end.

data.name: Nature's Bond
data.description: Your War Lion regains 785 health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Submission
data.description:
You cower submissively, causing all enemies within 30 feet to hate you less and deal only 50% damage to you for 5 seconds. For the next 5 seconds, you will cause 25% less hate in all enemy monsters. You will also deal 50% damage to them until the effect is broken.
If you attack anyone that you've Detaunted, the effect will immediately fade from them.

data.name: Sever Nerve
data.description: A directed strike that inflicts 1200 damage to your target.

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with direct damage there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional 303 Spirit damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Feline Grace
data.description: Your training and Elven grace allows you to remove all roots and snares from yourself and your War Lion.  For the next 10 seconds, roots and snares will have no effect on you or your War Lion.

data.name: Force of Will
data.description: You stare down your opponent, draining 200 of their Action Points into yourself, and reducing their Strength by 160 for 30 seconds.

data.name: Jagged Edge
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional 507 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Pack Synergy
data.description: Increases the additional damage dealt when either you or your pet critically hits by 50%, as long as you have a pet active.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: Increases your Strength by 160.

data.name: Confusing Movements
data.description: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to Dodge and Parry all attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: Increases your Elemental resistance by 252.

data.name: Relentless Assault
data.description: A prolonged fervor that grants 10 Action Points a second to everyone in your group within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Speed Training
data.description: Increases your War Lion's movement speed by 50%.

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Your attacks have a 10% reduced chance to be defended against.

data.name: Broad Swings
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your attacks will cleave through up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet in front of you, dealing unmitigable damage of 300 per strike.

data.name: Flanking
data.description:
All of your attacks deal 15% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.
Does not affect damage procs.

data.name: Close Combat
data.description: Any time you strike an enemy in melee with a direct attack, you will receive 25% less damage from ranged and magical attacks for 2 seconds. This effect will not stack with damage reductions from abilities.

data.name: Flashing Claws
data.description: Increases the chance to parry attacks by 10% for both you and your pet, as long as you have a pet active.

data.name: Ensnare
data.description: Deals 900 damage to your target, and roots them in place for 5 seconds.

data.name: Riposte
data.description: Each time you parry an enemy's attack, you will strike them back for 246 damage which they can not prevent.

data.name: Revenge!
data.description:
If your War Lion is killed, you will go into a rage and deal 50% more damage for 10 seconds.
Does not affect damage procs.

data.name: Flying Axe
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to all enemies in a line in front of you, up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Loner
data.description:
You deal 25% more damage, but you are unable to call forth your War Lion, and it will depart if it has already been summoned.
Does not affect damage procs.

data.name: Dominance
data.description: Deals 1800 damage to your target, and heals you for 50% of the damage done.

data.name: Tearing Blade
data.description: Slashing Blade and Sundering Chop will now cause an additional 258 damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Fetch!
data.description: You command your War Lion to toss its target through the air, knocking them closer to you.

data.name: Frenzied Slaughter
data.description: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Hack
data.description: A brutal chop at your enemy which deals 246 damage.

data.name: Coordinated Strike
data.description: You and your War Lion attack as a pack, ravaging your enemies.  You strike your target for 134 damage, and your pet strikes its target for 134 damage.  If you are within 35 feet of your pet's target, you will also strike that enemy for 134 damage, and likewise, if your pet is within 35 feet of your target, it will also strike your enemy for 134 damage as well.

data.name: Lion's Fury
data.description: You draw upon your mystical Elven heritage and furiously attack your target, dealing 246 Spirit damage.

data.name: Trained To Hunt
data.description:
You train your pet to hunt with you, increasing its Strength, Toughness, Wounds, and Weapon Skill by 50% of your bonus gained from items. Any time either you or your War Lion strikes an enemy, there is a 10% chance that you will deal an additional 207 damage over 3 seconds.

Your War Lion will gain the ability to bite its enemies, the ability to claw at multiple foes, and the ability to reduce several enemies' autoattack speeds.

data.name: Slashing Blade
data.description: A broad sweep of your axe which deals 184 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 25 feet away.

data.name: Lionheart
data.description: Lion's Fury no longer requires that the target be Cursed, costs 15 fewer action points, and deals 434 Spirit damage.

data.name: Echoing Roar
data.description: You and your War Lion each unleash a blasting shout, interrupting any enemies within 25 feet of either one of you and inflicting an Ailment which causes 525 Spirit damage over 15 seconds to all affected enemies.

data.name: Pack Hunting
data.description: Trained To Hunt will now also increase your autoattack speed by 50%.

data.name: Force Opportunity
data.description: You strike at your enemy with a brutal attack which causes 246 damage and can not be defended against. The victim's armor is reduced by 1600 for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Hack And Slash
data.description: Reduces the action point costs of Slashing Blade and Hack by 15 AP, and increases the armor penetration of Slashing Blade and Whirling Axe by 25%.

data.name: Whirling Axe
data.description: You rapidly spin your axe around for up to 3 seconds, dealing 337 damage every second to all enemies within 25 feet.  This ability will end if you lose your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Blade And Claw
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to all enemies within 25 feet of both you and your War Lion.

data.name: Blindside
data.note: Must be at your target's side or rear
data.description: You attack your enemy at a vulnerable spot, dealing 141 damage immediately and inflicting them with an Ailment which deals an additional 366 damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Trained To Threaten
data.description:
You train your pet to behave menacingly, increasing its Toughness and Wounds by your Toughness and Wounds gained from items and increasing your chance to critically hit by 5% as long as you are at your target's sides or back.

Your War Lion will gain the ability to threaten its enemies, the ability to reduce a foe's armor, and the ability to snare its enemies.

data.name: Sundering Chop
data.description: A powerful axe chop which deals 209 damage. If behind your target, ignores 15% of the victim's armor.

data.name: Shattering Blow
data.description: A powerful attack which shatters your enemy's bones, inflicting a Curse which deals 558 damage over 9 seconds.  If you attack an enemy from the sides or back, then you will also reduce their Strength by 120 for 9 seconds.

data.name: Fey Illusion
data.description: You invoke a minor bit of Elven power and attack your target with a befuddling strike, dealing 284 damage. The enemies attack speed is reduced by 20% for the next 10 seconds.  Enemy monsters will become confused and will believe that your selected groupmate, or your War Lion if you do not have one, struck the blow.

data.name: Blindsided!
data.description: Blindside will now also disorient your victim for 10 seconds, causing all of their abilities to take an additional 50% to build up.

data.name: Primal Fury
data.description:
For the next 10 seconds, you will deal 25% more damage.
Does not affect damage procs.

data.name: Threatening Distraction
data.description: Trained To Threaten will now reduce all hatred that you cause in hostile monsters by 75%.

data.name: Cull The Weak
data.description: A ruthless attack which deals 434 damage and will almost always deal critical damage to a wounded foe.

data.name: Full-Grown
data.description: Increases your Strength by 80, and increases your War Lion's Wounds by 160.

data.name: Thin The Herd
data.note: Must be at your target's side or rear
data.description: You call forth a small bit of power as you attack your enemy, dealing 246 damage and causing all healing that they use within the next 10 seconds to become 50% as effective.

data.name: Joy of the Hunt
data.description: Your War Lion is fully healed, and all group members within 100 feet instantly gain 250 Action Points.

data.name: Baiting Strike
data.description: An attack which momentarily distracts your enemy, dealing 171 damage to them.  Your targeted groupmate, or your War Lion if you do not have one, will cause 25% less hatred in all enemy monsters for 5 seconds.

data.name: Trained To Kill
data.description:
You train your pet to fight ferociously, increasing its Strength and Weapon Skill by your Strength and Weapon Skill gained from items and increasing your Toughness by 80.

Your War Lion will gain the ability to strike its enemies with a powerful mauling attack, the ability to attack its target repeatedly, and the ability to deal damage over time.

data.name: Cleave Limb
data.description: A sundering blow which deals 171 damage and inflicts your victim with an Ailment which reduces their movement speed by 40% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Pack Assault
data.description: A feral attack which deals 209 damage and inspires your groupmates to hunt as a pack.  Within the next 5 seconds, each group member within 100 feet will deal an additional 150 damage with their next attack.

data.name: Pounce
data.note:
You cannot perform this action while rooted
You cannot perform this action while airborne
data.description: You pounce forwards, leaping towards your target and causing 171 damage when you land. Your movement speed will subsequently be increased by 35% for 3 seconds. This speed increase will be dismissed if you use any ability.

data.name: Bonded Pack
data.description: You gain an additional 50 Morale every 5 seconds as long as you have an active War Lion. Any time you or one of your groupmates damages an enemy with Pack Assault they will gain 100 Morale.

data.name: Throat Bite
data.description: You command your pet to go for the throat!  Your War Lion's next attack within 20 seconds will deal an additional 209 damage and will Silence its victim, making them unable to use magic for 4 seconds.

data.name: Furious Mending
data.description: Trained To Kill now restores 120 health to you and your War Lion every 5 seconds.

data.name: Brutal Pounce
data.description: You command your pet to attack without mercy!  Your War Lion's next attack within 20 seconds will deal an additional 284 damage and will knock down its victim for 3 seconds.

data.name: Baited Trap
data.description: Baiting Strike will now also increase your chance to disrupt spells by 10% for 15 seconds, and increase your armor by 990.

data.name: Leonine Frenzy
data.description:
At your command, your War Lion goes berserk with a killing frenzy! All root, snare, and stun effects are removed from your pet, and it becomes immune to them for the next 10 seconds. During this time, your pet will deal an additional 31 damage every time it strikes an enemy.
Damage can only trigger once every 0.5 seconds and cannot crit.

data.name: Rampage
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, all of your abilities will cool down immediately and not cost any action points.  This will also affect your War Lion as well.
